title: High quality 1 bedroom apartment 52m2, prime location
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Prime location!
Spacious one bedroom apartment for rent in the 3rd arrondissement, near rue de Bretagne.
Total space 52m2.
A living room + a separate bedroom.
Separate kitchen.
bathroom and separate WC.
Lovely historical building, well maintained.
3rd floor WITH AN ELEVATOR.
Safe and quiet.
Large windows, lots of light.
Original hardwood floors.
High ceilings.
2 chimneys.
Lots of cupboards.
Heating on gas.
1650 euros per month including building charges and water.
Real estate agency fee to be paid on top of the rent (one time fee).
To schedule a visit, please send us an email or contact us on WhatsApp number +33663087837
